Artemis::

"err Commander Pacifixc"said Artemis "one of our shuttles still are 
in Maximal city, it didn't come back with the group that went there"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --  --
> 
> Pacifix smiles grimly to himself, an ill feeling hangs in the 
> air. "Ok Hoist, you can continue with whatever you were doing 
> before," says Pacifix, "I'll be in the control room if anyone needs 
> me." And with that, he heads to the control room.
> 
> "Sure think, Pacifix." replies Hoist, he flickers and dissapears.
> 
> -------------------------
> 
> Unfortunately, Firedrill couldn't hear him. Anachronox could.
> 
> The large bot inside the renewal chamber twitched, then started to 
> move. Inside the chamber, Anachronox' eyes opened to a blurry 
world. 
> His vision quickly clear and he realized that there was simply a 
> barrier between him and the what was beyond.
> 
> Moving his arm, he bumps the covering. A tapping sound can be heard 
> on the outside. Anachronox frowns, glancing downward, he spots his 
> legs and slams one knee forward into the shell with no result other 
> that a heavy thud. Starting to become frustrated, his arms and legs 
> simultaneously hit the shell, this time the thud reverbrates around 
> in nearby rooms.
> 
> Deciding that alternate approach to freedom was necessary, his legs 
> tense up, and four spikes lance outward, piercing the shell loud 
> crack. A fracture line appears moving up the shell to the upper 
> torso area. Anachronox smiles at this, <a little more> he thinks, 
> <just a little more>. The spikes retract, then slam outward again, 
> this time shattering the lower portion of the shell and suficiently 
> weakening the top half. Glass shards are sprayed everywhere. 
> Anachronx then uses his upper body to spray the remaining piece of 
> the shell away from him and towards the unfortunate bot Belthassan 
> who was standing in front of the once complete renewal chamber.
> 
> Taking his first steps, Anachronox pushes himself out, and crouches 
> as best he can on the shard covered floor. Apparently oblivious to 
> the other bot he observs his surroundings, face pointing downward 
> and still in crouch. His hematite black form shivers as he flexes 
> his techno-organic muscles, and twists his arms testing out his 
> form. <I have just been created... or have I? I can remember 
things, 
> but I am not in the memories...> His thoughts are of confusion but 
> he appears statuesque as he ponders this question. He only utters 
> one word, "Anachronox..."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Daemos: No, not for now. If you allow me, I will attend to those 
> > difficulties and contact you as soon as I am done. Shadow Destiny 
> out.
> > 
> > A few moments later, Belthassan heard a loud scream. Knowing 
> something 
> > was wrong, he ran to the Renewal Chamber. When he arrived, he saw 
> the 
> > large form of the robot, though he did not recognize him. 
However, 
> he 
> > had his idea on the matter.
> > 
> > Belthassan: Firedrill? Is that you?
